001package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.service;
002
003import android.annotation.SuppressLint;
004import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.Game;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.Guess;
006import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.entity.GameResult;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.entity.User;
008import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Scheduler;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
010import javax.inject.Inject;
011
012public class TeamleRepository {
013
014  private final TeamleServiceProxy proxy;
015  private final GameResultRepository resultRepository;
016  private final UserRepository userRepository;
017  private final GoogleSignInService signInService;
018  private final Scheduler scheduler;
019
020  private Game game;
021
022  @Inject
023  public TeamleRepository(TeamleServiceProxy proxy, GameResultRepository resultRepository,
024      UserRepository userRepository,
025      GoogleSignInService signInService, Scheduler scheduler) {
026    this.proxy = proxy;
027    this.resultRepository = resultRepository;
028    this.userRepository = userRepository;
029    this.signInService = signInService;
030    this.scheduler = scheduler;
031  }
032
033  public Single<Game> startGame(Game game) {
034    return signInService
035        .refreshBearerToken()
036        .observeOn(scheduler)
037        .flatMap((token) -> proxy.startGame(game, token))
038        .doOnSuccess(this::setGame);
039  }
040
041  @SuppressLint("checkResult")
042  public Single<Guess> submitGuess(String text) {
043    return signInService
044        .refreshBearerToken()
045        .observeOn(scheduler)
046        .flatMap((token) -> proxy.submitGuess(game.validate(text), token))
047        .flatMap((guess) -> {
048          game.getGuesses().add(guess);
049          return game.isSolved()
050              ? userRepository
051              .getCurrent()
052              .map((user -> toResult(game, user)))
053              .flatMap(resultRepository::add)
054              .map((result) -> guess)
055              : Single.just(guess);
056        });
057  }
058
059  public Game getGame() {
060    return game;
061  }
062
063  private void setGame(Game game) {
064  }
065
066  private GameResult toResult(Game game, User user) {
067    return new GameResult();
068  }
069}
